name.zh-cn: MediaPipe 臉部情緒辨識 v1.0

description.zh-cn: MediaPipe 臉部情緒辨識積木庫 v1.0。支援即時臉部情緒辨識、情緒狀態檢查、信心度追蹤、UI 控制等功能。整合了基於規則的情緒識別算法，支援開心/難過/憤怒/驚訝/中性等情緒。參考自 https://github.com/REWTAO/Facial-emotion-recognition-using-mediapipe
description.en: MediaPipe Facial Emotion Recognition blocks v1.0. Supports real-time facial emotion recognition, emotion state detection, confidence tracking, UI control and more. Includes rule-based emotion recognition algorithms supporting Happy/Sad/Angry/Surprised/Neutral emotions. Referenced from https://github.com/REWTAO/Facial-emotion-recognition-using-mediapipe
